attributes.additional_details: Indoor venues are now publicising that they will be welcoming crowds back to venues at quite a high capacity with social distancing in places. At the minute the rules state that football fans aren’t permitted into stadiums outdoors. This rule doesn’t make sense as how are people going to be allowed to meet indoors at venues which are enclosed. But football fans cannot sit outside in stadiums.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to allow football fans back into outdoor stadiums.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552036
